'''Minecraft: Skin Scanner''' is an app for {{w|iOS}} developed by [[57Digital]] which was initially released on August 21, 2013. This app allows you to turn a colored skin template into a real ''Minecraft'' skin.

== Purchase and availability ==
Minecraft: Skin Studio is available to buy on {{W|App Store}} for $3.99.

The app is available on the following platforms:
* iPhone
* iPad

The app supporting following languages:
* English

== Functional ==
With this app you can turn a drawing into a ''Minecraft'' [[skin]]. To do this, you need to color the printed skin template, then take a photo of it and the app will turn the drawing into a texture for the skin. This skin can be ported to ''Minecraft [[Bedrock Edition]]''.
